strings.Value: [Join with Amiri and attack the hodag] "To battle!"
"Everything all right? You want to go alone?"
"Maybe we should help you after all?"
"There he is! Now I slice this lizard into tiny pieces! Watch out and don't get in my way!"
{n}Amiri unleashes a fearsome battle cry and charges the monster.{/n}
"Wait, waitâ€¦ how much longer should I wait?"
"You bet!" {n}Amiri thrusts her chest forward, anticipating a good fight.{/n} "But I call you if I need you."
"You think I'm young pup? I don't need help." {n}She frowns slightly.{/n} "But stay close. Call if I need you."
